name: make_event
description: Create a calendar event in iCalendar format

SUMMARY.description: a short, one-line description of the event

DESCRIPTION.description: a more complete description of the calendar

DTSTART.description: the date and time that the event begins such as 19980119T020000

DTEND.description: the date and time that the event ends such as 19980119T030000

LOCATION.description: the intended venue with address for the event.
